system.description:
On Resound 3+, you may channel your piety and reverence to strengthen the buwaya you ride upon, turning them into a legendary makara.

Spend 1 Beat: you become Size 2 (Height 2), you ignore all terrain, you Heal 1 when you start your riff, and you gain +1 to your Posture and Resilience.
system.flavor:
Makara are the gods of the crocodiles of the Isles, the great vessels of ancient heroes and demigods who waged war to seize wealth.

Makara are said to be the first of the crocodiles, and are the original dragons: their spiritual pairing created the three draconic forms that many gods take on: Naga, the Flying Water Guardian Spirits. Pythons, the Deep Earth and Tree Serpent. And finally, the Crocodile, the Sea and Soil Dragon. It is said that a Makara encircles the entire cosmos, all of Kalibutan, and in the end times when violence has consumed like a bleeding, threading flame, it will consume all of reality.
